UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Strategic Single-Residue Substitution in the Antimicrobial Peptide Esc(1-21) Confers Activity against Staphylococcus aureus, Including Drug-Resistant and Biofilm Phenotype
Literature.Author: Loffredo MR, Casciaro B, Bellavita R, Troiano C, Brancaccio D, Cappiello F, Merlino F, Galdiero S, Fabrizi G, Grieco P, Stella L, Carotenuto A, Mangoni ML

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=0.78µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=0.78µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=3.12µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=0.78µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=12.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=6.25-12.5µM)
